column3: General concept is OK.  Needs minor revisions.\n
Thanks for the feedback. Revisions done.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4501_954d2e7201fcea7a95c5a95be574a8c0a1f16ce1/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
Code changes look straightforward and correct, haven't tested.\n

Tested:
- Start bitcoind -testnet
- `mv blk00000.dat blk00000.dat.old`
- `getblock 00000000b873e79784647a6c82962c70d228557d24a747ea4d1b8bbe878e1206`

Without patch: Segmentation fault
